title: Medical e-Learning Module Development and Effectiveness Evaluation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Knowledge and Educational Program Management Experience
context.additional_context: eLearning module planning and evaluation competency enhancement course for medical sector managers/leaders, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Establish a medical education content production plan by applying the e-learning module development standard process (analysis-design-development-evaluation)
Design usability evaluation metrics for medical e-learning modules based on learner needs analysis
Develop self-directed e-learning strategies implementable in limited technological environments
Evaluate the effectiveness of e-learning modules developed through project-based learning (PBL) using quantitative and qualitative methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
